choose.when: SELECT 도시 AS districtName, COUNT(*) OVER () AS totalCount FROM moduwww.주소기본정보 A GROUP BY 도시 ORDER BY (SELECT CAST(키1 AS INT) FROM MODUWWW.코드정보 Z WHERE 항번 = '1' AND Z.내용 = A.도시)
SELECT 구시군 AS districtName, COUNT(*) OVER () AS totalCount FROM moduwww.주소기본정보 WHERE 도시 = #{addr1} AND 구시군 IS NOT NULL AND 구시군 != '' GROUP BY 구시군 ORDER BY districtName;
